p.span: Welcome to Buckeye Union School District. To register online please click on your homeschool link to proceed with the online registration. If you need help find ing your home school, please click on this link Homeschool and enter your address.

h1.aria-label: All Offices in the Buckeye Union School District are Closed to the Public Until Further Notice
h1.span: All Offices in the Buckeye Union School District are Closed to the Public Until Further Notice

p.span: Due to the Governor’s order to Stay at Home, all offices in the Buckeye Union School District are closed to the public until further notice. We will be checking voicemail/email and you can expect a response within 1 business day.
